title: Requirements Gathering for DistributedSystemMonitor
description: Gather and document user requirements for the DistributedSystemMonitor system.

title: Design Architecture for DistributedSystemMonitor
description: Create a high-level architecture design for the DistributedSystemMonitor system.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for DistributedSystemMonitor
description: Design and implement the user interface for visualizing system health, performance, and potential issues.

title: Implement Backend Services for DistributedSystemMonitor
description: Develop the backend services that gather, process, and present data about the distributed system's performance and health.

title: Database Design and Implementation for DistributedSystemMonitor
description: Create the database schema and implement it to store system performance and health data.

title: Integration Testing of DistributedSystemMonitor Components
description: Verify that each component of the system functions as expected when integrated with others.
dependencies: Database Design and Implementation for DistributedSystemMonitor

title: Deployment of DistributedSystemMonitor System
description: Deploy the system to a production environment, ensuring that it is configured correctly and can handle expected loads.

title: Security Review for DistributedSystemMonitor System
description: Perform a security review to ensure that the system is secure against potential threats.
